text: John Michael Jones, better known as John Bardon (25 August 1939 - 12 September 2014), was an English stage and movie actor. He was awarded the Laurence Olivier Award in 1988 (1987 season) as 'Best Actor in a Musical' for Kiss Me, Kate. Bardon was known for his role as Jim Branning on the popular BBC television series, EastEnders. On 12 September 2014 the BBC announced that Bardon had died at the age of 75 in Hitchin, Hertfordshire, England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Middlesex Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Laurence Olivier Award winners
